org.qcri.rheem.basic.operators

Class SampleOperator<Type>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.qcri.rheem.core.plan.rheemplan.OperatorBase
      • org.qcri.rheem.core.plan.rheemplan.UnaryToUnaryOperator<Type,Type>
        • org.qcri.rheem.basic.operators.SampleOperator<Type>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActualOperator, ElementaryOperator, Operator
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    JavaRandomSampleOperator, JavaReservoirSampleOperator, SparkBernoulliSampleOperator, SparkRandomPartitionSampleOperator, SparkShufflePartitionSampleOperator

    public class SampleOperator<Type>
extends UnaryToUnaryOperator<Type,Type>
    A random sample operator randomly selects its inputs from the input slot and pushes that element to the output slot.
